The Better Child Care Course

Learn the practical applications of early childhood development

One Class

1 online class, 1 assessment.

ExclusiveContent

Created by early childhood experts.

Anytime, Anywhere

Online learning at your own pace.

Get Started Now!
  • One class only – $50
  • Become a Plinkit member and newsletter subscriber

One Class

Your solution to better child care. Learn early childhood basics and how to apply them to every day situations. Six toolkits in one online class.

By the end of this class, you’ll know how to:
  • Recognize what is developmentally reasonable and appropriate for most children ages 2 – 6.
  • Handle challenging behavior.
  • Support a child through emotional development.
  • Build independent problem-solving skills.
  • Engage in play and navigate social situations.
  • Develop pre-academic skills through play.
For caregivers:
  • Be better – Learn key concepts in early childhood.
  • Be prepared – Put theory into practice with scenario-based learning.
  • Be proud – Show your skills. Receive a Plinkit certificate with successful completion of an assessment. If you’re an [insert company name] caregiver, you can show a Plinkit badge on your [insert company name] profile page.
For parents:
  • Find out – Tantrums. Discipline. Emotional development. Are you and your caregiver on the same page? How do you know? Take our course and find out.
  • Get the essentials – Establish a baseline of information and skills between you and your caregiver.
  • Give your kids the best – Know what the best early childhood experts know.

Exclusive Content

Access techniques and strategies developed by the best early childhood experts.

  • Original content based on common situations among children ages 2 – 6+.
  • Practical learning with example scripts.
  • Discover how qualified practioners handle every day scenarios.

Created exclusively for Plinkit by teachers with over 60 years of collective classroom experience.

Anytime, Anywhere

Learn + Do in 30 questions.

  • Learn – Read our materials at your own pace and on your own terms, mobile or desktop.
  • Do – Take the assessment whenever you’re ready.

We’re here to help at support@myplinkit.com.
